Name: Red Chasseurs
Details: Once known as the 159th Hussar Regiment, the Red Chasseurs are a former SLDF unit that chose to join the Taurian Concordat after the fall of the Star League. Usually assigned to the Concordat's I Corps, which is tasked with defending the strategic world of New Vandenberg and its nearby systems, the Red Chasseurs are the quick reaction force against any threats from the Davion or Liao borders.
